title: Should i buy pixel 4a in india is after sales service good in india ???
content: I know google has partnered with B2X for service but how long will that partnership be continued Google not launching pixel 4A 5G in India concern me whether i should buy 4a or not or Google is not interested in indian market. also the pricing of a slightly higher as compared to US pricing so it makes me more concerned about should I buy a pixel phone or not.
